trans-unit.source: Represents an individual row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma linha individual em um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The GridViewRow class is used represent an individual row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe GridViewRow é usada representar uma linha individual em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a designated row type using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Cada linha de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle tem um tipo de linha designada usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>enumeração.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different row types.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os tipos de linha diferente.

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`DataRow`|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`EmptyDataRow`|The empty row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: | Tipo de linha | Descrição | |--------------|-----------------| | `DataRow`| Uma linha de dados no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>. | | `EmptyDataRow`| Na linha vazia a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The empty row is displayed when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has no records to display and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> template is not `null`.| |`Footer`|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`Header`|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`Pager`|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`Separator`|A separator row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| To determine the row type of a GridViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A linha vazia é exibida quando o controle de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>tem registros a serem exibidos e o modelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>não é `null`. | | `Footer`| A linha de rodapé no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>. | | `Header`| A linha de cabeçalho no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>. | | `Pager`| Uma linha de pager no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>. | | `Separator`| Uma linha separadora no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>. | Para determinar o tipo de linha de um objeto GridViewRow, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A GridViewRow object also has a state associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto GridViewRow também tem um estado associado a ele.

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: O estado pode ser uma combinação bit a bit dos valores na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`Alternate`|The GridViewRow object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`Edit`|The GridViewRow object is in edit mode.| |`Normal`|The GridViewRow object is in its normal (default) state.| |`Selected`|The GridViewRow object is selected.| To determine the state of a GridViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Valor de estado | Descrição | |-----------------|-----------------| | `Alternate`| O objeto GridViewRow é uma linha alternativa no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>. | | `Edit`| O objeto GridViewRow está no modo de edição. | | `Normal`| O objeto GridViewRow está no estado normal (padrão). | | `Selected`| O objeto GridViewRow está selecionado. | Para determinar o estado de um objeto GridViewRow, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control stores all of its data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle armazena todas as suas linhas de dados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a GridViewRow object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o índice de um objeto GridViewRow no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>coleção, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the properties of the underlying data object that is bound to the GridViewRow object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as propriedades do objeto de dados subjacente que está associado ao objeto GridViewRow usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A> property is available only during and after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>propriedade está disponível somente durante e após o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>eventos de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the data object in the underlying data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o índice do objeto de dados na fonte de dados subjacente, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the individual cells of the GridViewRow object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as células individuais do objeto GridViewRow usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a cell contains other controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Se uma célula contiver outros controles, você pode recuperar um controle de célula usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>coleção da célula.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the cell to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> specified.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>método da célula para localizar o controle, se o controle tiver um <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> field column or an automatically generated field column, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> property of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar um valor de campo de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>campo coluna ou um campo gerado automaticamente, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A>propriedade da célula.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from other field column types where the field value is bound to a control, first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then access the appropriate property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar um valor de campo de outros tipos de coluna do campo em que o valor do campo está associado a um controle, recuperar o controle de célula apropriada e, em seguida, a propriedade apropriada do controle de acesso.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to use a data-binding expression directly in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column without binding the value to a property of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > É possível usar uma expressão de associação de dados diretamente em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>coluna campo sem associação o valor a uma propriedade de um controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the field value is automatically placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o valor do campo é automaticamente colocado em um <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the field value, you must first retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control from the appropriate cell and then use its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar o valor do campo, você deve recuperar o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>controlar na célula apropriada e, em seguida, use seu <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of GridViewRow, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de GridViewRow, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Usar este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>|The value of the `dataItemIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A>|The value of the `rowIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A>|The value of the `rowState` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>|The value of the `rowType` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>| O valor de `dataItemIndex` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A>| O valor de `rowIndex` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A>| O valor de `rowState` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>| O valor de `rowType` parâmetro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*> collection of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>coleção de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*> in the underlying <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>em subjacente <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying data object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object is bound.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de dados subjacente à qual o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objeto está associado.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItem property to access the properties of the underlying data object to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is bound.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de item de dados para acessar as propriedades do objeto de dados subjacente à qual o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objeto está associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The DataItem property is only available during and after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de item de dados só está disponível durante e após o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>eventos de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade se aplica somente às linhas de dados.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the underlying data object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object is bound.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o objeto de dados subjacente à qual o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objeto está associado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*> in the underlying <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>em subjacente <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItemIndex property to determine the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A> in the underlying <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade DataItemIndex para determinar o índice do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>em subjacente <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade se aplica somente às linhas de dados.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*> in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>na fonte de dados subjacente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to pass an event up the page's ASP.NET server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Determina se deve transmitir um evento a hierarquia de controle de servidor ASP.NET da página.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o evento foi cancelado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*> collection of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>coleção de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to determine the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade RowIndex para determinar o índice do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>do objeto no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>coleção de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade se aplica somente às linhas de dados.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*> collection of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>coleção de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property to determine the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>propriedade para determinar o estado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table: |Status value|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is in edit mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is in its normal (default) state.| |`DataControlRowState.Selected`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is selected.| This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: O estado pode ser uma combinação bit a bit dos valores na tabela a seguir: | Valor de status | Descrição | |------------------|-----------------| | `DataControlRowState.Alternate`| O objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>é uma linha alternativa no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>. | | `DataControlRowState.Edit`| O objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>está no modo de edição. | | `DataControlRowState.Normal`| O objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>está no estado normal (padrão). | | `DataControlRowState.Selected`| O objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>está selecionado. | Essa propriedade normalmente é usada para determinar o estado de uma linha antes de executar uma operação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de linha do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowType property to determine the type of row that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object represents.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade RowType para determinar o tipo de linha que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objeto representa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different row type values using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os valores de tipo de linha diferente usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>enumeração.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The empty row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: | Tipo de linha | Descrição | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| Uma linha de dados no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| A linha de rodapé no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| A linha de cabeçalho no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| Na linha vazia a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>

trans-unit.source: The empty row is displayed when <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control does not have any records to display.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A separator row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: Na linha vazia é exibida quando o controle de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>não tem registros a serem exibidos. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| Uma linha de pager no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| Uma linha separadora no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>. | Essa propriedade normalmente é usada para determinar o tipo da linha antes de executar uma operação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> valores.
